<page title>: Siemens 6FC5203-0AF02-0AA0 6FC5 203-0AF02-0AA0 SINUMERIK OP 012 Keypad Panel QTY
description: Siemens 6FC5 203-0AF02-0AA0 SINUMERIK Operator Panel Front OP 012, 12.1-inch, Keypad, 800x600 TFT Color Display, 59-key Membrane Keypad with 2 x (8 + 2) Horizontal and 2 x 8 Vertical Softkeys, Integral Mouse, USB Port
miscellaneous: The SINUMERIK OP 012 operator panel front with 12" TFT color display with a resolution of 800 x 600 pixels (SVGA) features 2 x (8 + 2) horizontal, 2 x 8 vertical membrane softkeys. The KB 483C full CNC keyboard can be used as input keyboard. The operator panel front is mounted from the rear using special clamps supplied with the panel. The SINUMERIK operator panel front OP 012 can be used for: SINUMERIK 810D/DE powerline/840D/DE powerline; SINUMERIK 840Di powerline.
